channel.title: Help, I can’t do literally anything
channel.description: I’ve got insane block. I’m dying to create my first track with the update but I’ve got literally nothing. HELP.

item.title: Help, I can’t do literally anything
item.dc:creator: Paradice
item.description:
Hello there I’m a newbie. anyways when I first used Auxy I had no idea what I was doing. I would tell you to spend a good few hours on it everyday! Like I had no idea what scenes were but the more I discovered the better my tracks got. Now I have a album out and so many more coming. I love Auxy it has given me the abilities to have a thousand instruments in my pocket! How cool is that. you will get it believe me it takes time but soon you will making tracks like crazy and having so much fun with it!

Read full topic

item.title: Help, I can’t do literally anything
item.dc:creator: Bassment_Chemists
item.description:
At some point only you can help you.

But possibly this quote will be of some inspiration:
“Everything in life is temporary. So if things are going good, enjoy it because it won’t last forever; and, if things are going bad, don’t worry. It can not last forever either.”

;^D

item.title: Help, I can’t do literally anything
item.dc:creator: SpaghettiSauce
item.description:
Go through old projects. If you get nothing, just make a random chord in a random key. Then, listen to see what you think should come next. Try to recreate that chord you think of in your head.

Read full topic
item.source: Help, I can’t do literally anything

item.title: Help, I can’t do literally anything
item.dc:creator: Shepdoge
item.description:
Something I’m still trying to come to grips with: don’t be afraid to mess up tracks with weird ideas. That’s what I find pulling me back the most; the prospect of ruining a potential song in a motivational sense. This is silly in retrospect, because I feel my best music comes from trying something I haven’t before.

Read full topic
